title: Spiky Ball
summaries: Spiky Balls are consumable ranged weapons that are primarily used as passive traps, by tossing them to the ground, where enemies who pass over them will take damage up to (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 6 / (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 7 times (after which the Spiky Balls vanish). If not destroyed, they will automatically vanish after 1 minute. They can also be directly thrown at enemies, but they have a very short arc and quickly fall to the ground. Spiky Balls are dropped by all goblins in the Goblin Army and can be purchased from the Goblin Tinkerer for 80 CC each.
(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) The Goblin Tinkerer uses Spiky Balls to defend himself against nearby enemies.
